122431.<pc>は 第<%nL_KAISAISUU>回\n『<%sL_KUJI_NAME:
put the purchased tickets in their <%sL_ITEM>.

122435.「はい では 第<%nL_KAISAISUU>回\n 『<%sL_KUJI_NA:
Yes, it's a ticket for the No. <%dL_KAISAISUU> <%sL_KUJI_NAME>...
I don't see you taking out your <%sL_ITEM>, so I'm going to assume that you're new to this thing, right?
Those tickets are really important. If you just leave it in your pocket, it'll fade out or you might even drop it!
We can't have that now, can we? It's proper etiquette to keep your tickets safe in their own case.
So, for someone new like you, I'll give you this <%sL_ITEM>. Please take good care of it, won't you?

122437.「……うう。申し訳ありません。\n この売り場の くじ券は\n すべて 売り切れ:
I'm really sorry, but... all of the tickets at

<bw_break>

122438.「それでは またのお越しを\n お待ち申し上げております！\n<turn_end: We look forward to seeing you again soon!<turn_end>

122445.「アストルティア★ハッピーくじでは\n くじ券を １枚 <%nL_DEF_GOL:
The Astoltia Happy Lottery sells tickets at a cost of <%dL_DEF_GOLD> Gold per ticket, and you can only buy a maximum of 20 tickets.
If any of your tickets matches that of the winning requirements, you'll win a prize! You also get a prize just for participating.
However, please remember that you will only win the highest prize from one ticket, even if it meets multiple winning requirements.
Tickets can be purchased in all stations except the ones in Lendor and Luckland. If a station is sold out, try checking the others.
And most importantly! The condition to win the grand prize is matching the correct town, so try buying from different towns if you can!
You can check the official Dragon Quest X site for more details.

122446.「ビッグなドリームをラックでお届け！\n アストルティア★ハッピーくじ屋です。\:
Your wildest dreams and amazing luck are
coming your way! This is the Astoltia Happy
Lottery Kiosk. Tickets are on sale now!<break>

122448.「いらっしゃいませ！ こちら\n ビッグなドリームをラックでお届け！\n アスト:
Welcome! Your wildest dreams and amazing luck
are coming your way! This is the Astoltia
Happy Lottery Kiosk.
<bw_break>

122449.「はじめまして！ こちら\n ビッグなドリームをラックでお届け！\n アストルテ:
Nice to meet you! Your wildest dreams and great luck are coming your way! This is the Astoltia Happy Lottery Kiosk.
The Astoltia Happy Lottery sells tickets at a cost of <%dL_DEF_GOLD> Gold per ticket, and you can only buy a maximum of 20 tickets.
If any of your tickets matches that of the winning requirements, you'll win a prize! You also get a prize just for participating.
However, please remember that you will only win the highest prize from one ticket, even if it meets multiple winning requirements.
Tickets can be purchased in all stations except the ones in Lendor and Luckland. If a station is sold out, try checking the others.
And most importantly! The condition to win the grand prize is matching the correct town, so try buying from different towns if you can!
You can check the official Dragon Quest X site for more details.

122520.「今は 第<%nL_KAISAISUU>回\n 『<%sL_KUJI_NAME>:
And now, for the second time, we have a special prize. First prize is a town and a number... The numbers for the different towns
are the numbers for the different towns. The first prize is the first place winning number and the number of the lottery... The second
prize is the second place winning number and the last five digits of the lottery ticket... And this time, the third prize is... Oh, my
God! Every town that sells lottery tickets will be entered into a drawing, and the winning ticket will be the lottery ticket
bought in the selected town. For example, if the city chosen for the third prize is Gathara, then every lottery ticket purchased
in Gathara will be used to win the third prize...
